messages.subject: The Rumor Mill
messages.msgSnippet: While Babel fish may be the friend our Tiffany the rotten sushi reject irks me every chance it gets  LOL So, to those of you with more patience or better
messages.messageBody:
While Babel fish may be the friend our Tiffany the rotten sushi reject
irks me every chance it gets LOL

So, to those of you with more patience or better comprehension skills
than I possess I offer to you the "Love Chart of the Shinsengumi"--- a
list of members and their alleged wives and/ or girlfriends

http://g1342122.at.infoseek.co.jp/bakumatu_tayuu.htm


Okita had three wives and a girlfriend??????

Kondou had a wife and 4 babes on the side??????????????

And if things can get any weirder it appears that "Hentai" Harada was
the only relatively faithful one of the bunch!

--
Barbara Sheridan

http://www.barbarasheridan.net
